TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit ConfigurationLockCollection extends System.Object implements class System.Collections.ICollection, class System.Collections.IEnumerable
Public NotInheritable Class ConfigurationLockCollection Implements ICollection
public ref class ConfigurationLockCollection sealed : System::Collections::ICollection
type ConfigurationLockCollection = class interface ICollection interface IEnumerable

summary.span: 包含鎖定的組態物件的集合。

span.span: Contains a collection of locked configuration objects.
This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在組態檔的組態區段包含屬性和項目。In a configuration file, a configuration section contains both attributes and elements. A集合的組態區段中，已鎖定屬性存在，而且經由屬性類別。A collection exists for the locked attributes of a configuration section, and is accessed through the property of the class. 另一個集合的組態區段中，鎖定的項目存在，而且經由屬性類別。Another collection exists for the locked elements of a configuration section, and is accessed through the property of the class. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用型別。The following code example demonstrates how to use the type. [!code-csharp[System.Configuration.ConfigurationLockCollection#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Configuration.ConfigurationLockCollection/CS/ConfigurationLockCollection.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Configuration.ConfigurationLockCollection#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Configuration.ConfigurationLockCollection/VB/ConfigurationLockCollection.vb#1)]

span.span: The name of the configuration object.

summary.span: 藉由將組態物件加入集合中來鎖定它。

span.span: Locks a configuration object by adding it to the collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 將組態物件來加入集合指定的組態物件已鎖定且無法修改，直到它已從集合移除。Adding a configuration object to the collection specifies that the configuration object is locked and cannot be modified until it has been removed from the collection. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會示範如何使用 方法。The following code example demonstrates how to use the method. 此程式碼範例是針對提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. exception.span: 發生在 不符合集合中現有的組態物件時。
